QuestData.Title: The Best Defense...
QuestData.Description:
Our next path is through Nokhud territory. Historically, we have been at a tentative peace with their clan, but times have changed.
If we do not act first, we leave ourselves open while we're vulnerable. My scouts have reported that one of their war leaders has been spotted near Dragonsmeet. Take the fight to her directly - do not let her gather the forces to assault us on the move.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, this will give me some peace of mind as we prepare for our journey.
